feature.name: pg_basebackup incremental backup
feature.description: Incremental backups can be created using the `--incremental` option for [`pg_basebackup`](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/app-pgbasebackup.html). The new application [pg_combinebackup](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/17/app-pgcombinebackup.html) …
